docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: While I fled from the news for a few weeks, Jim McKinley, my able assistant, compiled a scrapbook of the period's notable events, documenting the usual human record of no change, puzzling change and change for the worse.
docs.snippet: LEAD: While I fled from the news for a few weeks, Jim McKinley, my able assistant, compiled a scrapbook of the period's notable events, documenting the usual human record of no change, puzzling change and change for the worse.

headline.main: New York to Enforce New Law on Smoking

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: After a two-month grace period, New York City's anti-smoking law turns tough today when city health inspectors may begin issuing court citations to violators, rather than polite warnings.
docs.snippet: LEAD: After a two-month grace period, New York City's anti-smoking law turns tough today when city health inspectors may begin issuing court citations to violators, rather than polite warnings.

headline.main: Pregnant Women's Use Of VDT's Is Scrutinized

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Women who used video display terminals for more than 20 hours each week in the first three months of pregnancy suffered almost twice as many miscarriages as women doing other types of office work, according to a new study.
docs.snippet: LEAD: Women who used video display terminals for more than 20 hours each week in the first three months of pregnancy suffered almost twice as many miscarriages as women doing other types of office work, according to a new study.
